maindishes.name: Encebollado Mixto
maindishes.description: A traditional Ecuadorian fish soup made with albacore tuna, yuca, and onions, typically served with avocado and lime.

maindishes.name: Encebollado Mixto + Arroz
maindishes.description: Fish stew, with tuna and shrimp, cassava and pickled onions served with rice, banana chips and corn nuts.

maindishes.name: Ceviche De Camaron
maindishes.description: A refreshing shrimp ceviche marinated in lime juice with tomatoes, onions, and cilantro, served with popcorn and plantain chips.

maindishes.name: Arroz Con Camarones
maindishes.description: Arroz con camarones [pronounced a·rros kon ka·ma·ro·nes] translates to “rice with shrimp”. Another name for this dish is arroz amarillo con camarones which translates to “yellow rice with shrimp”.

maindishes.name: Arroz Marinero
maindishes.description: This seafood rice recipe, also known as Arroz marinero or Arroz con mariscos, is a delicious Latin American dish made with rice cooked in seafood broth and sautéed with shrimp, clams, squid, bay scallops, onions, garlic, bell pepper, cilantro and spices.

maindishes.name: Pescado Frito
maindishes.description: Fried Fish, comes with White Rice, Fried Plantains (Patacones or Maduro), Salad (lettuce, tomato, onion, sometimes avocado), lemon on the side, and fries if you desire on the side as well.

sidedishes.name: Salchipapa
sidedishes.description: A popular street food dish made of French fries topped with sliced hot dogs and served with various condiments like ketchup and mayonnaise.

sidedishes.name: Nuggets De Pollo Con Papas Fritas
sidedishes.description: Chicken nuggets with a side of French fries.

sidedishes.name: Papa y Pollo
sidedishes.description: Chicken with French Fries, can come with lettuce, tomato, mayonnaise, ketchup, aji (Ecuadorian hot sauce)

drinks.name: Inca Kola
drinks.description: A sweet, bright yellow soda that is a popular choice in Ecuador, often enjoyed with meals.

drinks.name: Coke
drinks.description: Classic Coca-Cola, a favorite carbonated beverage worldwide.

drinks.name: Gatorade
drinks.description: A sports drink available in various flavors, perfect for refreshing after physical activity.

drinks.name: Pepsi
drinks.description: Another popular carbonated soft drink, known for its bold flavor.

drinks.name: Guitig (Sparkling Water)
drinks.description: A refreshing sparkling water that is perfect for pairing with meals.

drinks.name: Heineken
drinks.description: A well-known international lager, enjoyed for its crisp and refreshing taste.

desserts.name: Fresas Con Crema
desserts.description: Fresh strawberries served with a sweet and creamy sauce.

desserts.name: Flan
desserts.description: A baked custard dessert with a caramel topping, popular in Latin America and Spain.
